channel.title: How do i get my server online? like "onebigbombscape.no-ip.org"
channel.description:
Right now i can only go on my server by typing localhost, how to i make an ip?
I already have a no-ip.com account,b ut what now?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2007, 10:29:33 AM[/size][hr]Cmon help

item.title: How do i get my server online? like "onebigbombscape.no-ip.org"
item.dc:creator: @dragster32 dragster32
item.description:
@dragster32 wrote:

thankyou no dont matter if you have a router if you use ham

whats ham network
ham pass
and the ip on top of your ham window?

btw when you start editing your server its more or less common sense. There isnt really a way to teach coding well and if there is it takes a long time to write guide i’d start out by using ctrl+f in the client.java file and search the name of your source that you used. Then i’d change all them to the name of the server your creating.

item.title: How do i get my server online? like "onebigbombscape.no-ip.org"
item.dc:creator: @dragster32 dragster32
item.description:
@dragster32 wrote:

unless you have a router…you’ll know if you have one because you would have had to go to a store and buy 1 in rl… your gona have to use hamachi. The guardians tut is good (i assume thats what your using) but it doesnt explain what a router is or how to set up ham.

[b]Go to www.hamachi.cc

download ham

make a network (bottom right button to the right)

make any name any pass for that network

write down number on top of ur ham window.

then ppl can get on by putting that number as the server ip in moparisthebest.com

they’ll also have to connect to the network you made with the network name and pass[/b]

hope it helps

Read full topic
